plot outline: Anand is a career oriented person who wont let any one come in his way not even love.While he is posted in Goa he comes across Sania whose alike him they both end up standing night together.Malvika beautiful daughter of Anand's boss is madly in love with him and wants to marry him at any cost.But Sania discloses about her pregnancy to Anand and is ready to be a single mother but Anand insists on getting married to her.Malvika out of frustration marries Anand's friend Sujit who has soft corner towards her but this doesn't have any impact on Anand as he is happy in his new life with Sania.Malvika then with her father plans to destroy him.
title: Premsutra
plot: Anand is a career oriented person who wont let any one come in his way not even love.While he is posted in Goa he comes across Sania whose alike him they both end up standing night together.Malvika beautiful daughter of Anand's boss is madly in love with him and wants to marry him at any cost.But Sania discloses about her pregnancy to Anand and is ready to be a single mother but Anand insists on getting married to her.Malvika out of frustration marries Anand's friend Sujit who has soft corner towards her but this doesn't have any impact on Anand as he is happy in his new life with Sania.Malvika then with her father plans to destroy him.::alex.mjacko@mypeepul.com
